Enabling this service will make screen rotation settings to be remembered for each individual application.
 NOTE: This service requires permission to change rotation settings.
 If using Android 6 and later, please go to Settings and grant this permission, when requested.
 Make sure to check the "Don't ask me again" checkbox, otherwise the service will not be fully functional.
Unable to set screen rotation settings
Notify when auto-rotation is enabled or disabled by service
When checked, screen auto-rotation will be enabled for new applications

Simple Rotation Manager is missing permission to change screen rotation settings.\n Go to Settings->Accessibility->Screen rotation manager->Settings and grant this permission in a pop-up window.\n Please make sure you check the "Don't ask me again" checkbox, otherwise the servise will not be functional.
Thank you for granting permission.\n Please make sure you checked the \"Don\'t ask me again\" checkbox, otherwise the servise will not be functional
Without permission to change rotation settings, the service will not be functional.
When enabled, full screen activities, such as watching video, will have rotation enabled, disregarding of app setting.
